entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

More info: Writing

Run server

More info: Server

Generate static files

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

More info: Deployment

entry.title: Web01: First Post
entry.content:
Start to Hexo!

Hexo can be written in markdown and have a complete structure to deploy static webpages. 

Because HTML is supported in markdown, this makes hexo more powerful. Here is an example:



____________________________________
|                                  |
|    　    / )))                   |      
|        ／ イ  　　　((( \         |   
|       (　 ﾉ　　　　 ￣Ｙ＼         |
|      (   ＼    ∧＿∧  ｜　)        |
|       ヽ　 ヽ`(´･ω･)_／ノ/         |
|       ＼  |　⌒Ｙ⌒　/ /     　    |
|         \  ヽ　｜　 ﾉ /           |
|　        ＼ ﾄー仝ーｲ /            |
|　         ｜ ミ土彡 ｜            |
|　          )　　　  ｜            |
|　         /         |            |
|                                  | 
____________________________________

Future plan

  • Be familar to use Hexo.
  • Post Today learn or other works here.
  • Write something worth to record in my life.
  • Practice to maintain a webpage.

That's all

As title, bye!
